project.teaser: The mission of CRYSTALLINE (eleCtRonic-based sYSTems reseArch exceLLence IN Europe) is to train junior scientists (JSs) as future leaders in Electronic Based Systems (EBSs) research. Teaming up with three Austrian universities and drawing on their individual curricula, the...
project.objective: The mission of CRYSTALLINE (eleCtRonic-based sYSTems reseArch exceLLence IN Europe) is to train junior scientists (JSs) as future leaders in Electronic Based Systems (EBSs) research. Teaming up with three Austrian universities and drawing on their individual curricula, the Silicon Austria Labs (SAL) will offer JS positions in its entire EBS research portfolio scope, ranging from electronic components, via devices drawing on micro- and nanoelectronics, up to designs at the system or even system of systems level – and where electronics and embedded software meet to form the technological backbone of digitalization. The JSs becoming full SAL employees and being fully embedded into SAL’s research environment, CRYSTALLINE will offer them a global picture of EBS research perspectives and connections to SAL’s (inter-)national academic and industrial innovator network. For fostering their career development, the research topics will be fully aligned with the regional academic and industrial technology clusters’ agendas, with SAL’s three sites across Austria (Graz, Linz, Villach) multiplying the options available to the JSs. Complementing our dedication to research, we will train the JSs in essential transferable skills like communication, (project) management or ethics, and will offer secondments in our international network. Scientific forums, summits, social activities and networking days will be just some of the means in CRYSTALLINE to propel excellence and evolution in our JSs’ studies. In the proposed 60-month MSCA-COFUND action, we plan to attract 2 cohorts of 9 JSs for 48-month PhD studies. Via this action, we will be able to improve on our critical mass and our impact on EBS research at the highest level of scientific excellence. CRYSTALLINE will foster a brain-gain by attracting international talents to join the SAL network, and in turn international scientists can benefit from our SAL environment that unites academic excellence with industrial entrepreneurship.
project.title: eleCtRonic-based sYSTems reseArch exceLLence IN Europe
project.keywords: Electronic Based Systems, Embedded Systems, Intelligent Wireless Systems, Microsystems, Power Electronics, Sensor Systems

article.title: Creating the leaders of future electronic-based system research

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: HORIZON TMA MSCA Cofund Doctoral programme
category.description: HORIZON TMA MSCA Cofund Doctoral programme
